lead_paragraph: GLICKENHAUS--Seth, was a true giant among men. He was blessed with a brilliant mind, a strong work ethic, devotion to family and a dynamic personality. He was also one of the great contrarians and outstanding investors of all time. Seth was the founding Partner and guiding light of the highly successful investment firm, Glickenhaus & Company, which specialized in the management of High Net Worth and Institutional assets. He served his clients with much distinction. He did not suffer fools lightly and always had an ability to get to the very heart of any matter quickly and succinctly. Seth also knew the importance of giving back and was extremely generous with his philanthropic pursuits. He cared very much about the less fortunate in our society. Underneath it all, Seth always had a sweet manner with much underlying decency. He possessed genuine humility and commanded the utmost respect and admiration by all those with whom he came into contact. We will always remember Seth for his consistently high level of optimism and personal warmth. His personality exuded understated elegance and he will be missed. We send our deepest condolences to his wife, Sarah, and to his children, Nancy and James and to the extended Glickenhaus family. The Straus Group, Neuberger Berman LLC 1/3
